array.string: SCAN_TARGETS=("/Volumes/Macintosh HD") CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE=/opt/Quarantine CLAMDSCAN_LOG=/opt/local/var/log/clamav/clamdscan.log ; /opt/local/bin/clamdscan --reload && ( /bin/test -d $CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE || /bin/mkdir -p $CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE ) && ( /bin/test -d ${CLAMDSCAN_LOG%/*} || /bin/mkdir -p ${CLAMDSCAN_LOG%/*} ) && echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan started on `/bin/date` â€¦" >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG && ( /opt/local/bin/clamdscan --multiscan --quiet --fdpass --move=$CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE --log=$CLAMDSCAN_LOG "${SCAN_TARGETS[@]}" && echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan completed on `/bin/date`." >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG || echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan exited with error code $? on `/bin/date`." >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG )
